response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant savings compared to its market value and is intended to provide you with an unparalleled chance to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a long-term relationship with you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
